It is the end of summer. Han Hui, a university
student, meets a mysterious young girl named He
Jia in the mountains. After this chance meeting
the two embark on a delightful journey

Shan Gui is a short, linear, kinetic visual-novel
set in Nanjing's gorgeous Purple Mountain. It
follows the adventure of two young girls as they
tour the park, attempting to recount faded
childhood memories. Han Hui is moody and depressed
until she eventually becomes enraptured by He Jia's
overwhelming warmth and happiness. In He Jia, Han
Hui finds respite from her sadness and a brand new
friend... a friend who may be more than she
suggests
